mods.li: Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic

value.description: An advanced pistol that shoots dense clumps of pure hatred containing trace amounts of Torture Liquid at high velocities. It is used extensively by Torture Liquid Union empires, especially because it requires an immense amount of suffering to make.

An advanced rifle that shoots dense clumps of pure vitriol containing trace amounts of Torture Liquid at high velocities. It is used extensively by Torture Liquid Union empires, especially because it requires an immense amount of suffering to make.\n\nThough its projectiles are the weakest of the Overpowered weapons, its firerate makes up for it.

An advanced shotgun that shoots low-density clumps of Torture Liquid at high velocities. The projectiles have a burning hatred against armor, and will do anything it can to get around it. It is used extensively by Torture Liquid Union empires, especially because it requires an immense amount of suffering to make.

An advanced sniper that shoots dense clumps of pure Torture Liquid at high velocities, able to kill almost anything in a single shot. It is used extensively by Torture Liquid Union empires, especially because it requires an immense amount of suffering to make.

A weapon made of pure Overpowered Alloy, further empowered by Torture Liquid. It fires a massive projectile of pure Torture Liquid, utterly devastating whatever it hits. Those hit in the blast radius of the Overpowered Cannon experience untold amounts of suffering.\n\nWhile it excels at long range and extremely close range, it is highly inconsistent at medium ranges. Care should be taken with the Cannon since its explosions can accidentially destroy things.
